annotation.procedure: Picked the karar manually from the prominent pitch of the audio recording with 1 cent precision.
annotation.reference: Salamon, J., & Gomez, E. (2012). Melody extraction from polyphonic music signals using pitch contour characteristics. IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing, 20(6), 1759-1770.

audioHistogramMatching.procedure: Tonic identification by audio histogram matching given the annotated makam
audioHistogramMatching.reference: Gedik, A. C., & Bozkurt, B. (2010). Pitch-frequency histogram-based music information retrieval for Turkish music. Signal Processing, 90(4), 1049-1063.

repetitiveSectionLinking.procedure: Tonic identification by linking the repetitive section given in the score
repetitiveSectionLinking.reference: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., & Serra, X. Score Informed Tonic Identification for Makam Music of Turkey. In Proceedings of ISMIR, 2013.
